attributes.action: Remove the requirement for a TV licence if you do not watch BBC broadcasts
attributes.additional_details: It is abhorrent that the BBC can demand money from everyone, whether they watch BBC programmes or not. As far as I know, this is the only service where you have to subscribe, even if you never use it.
attributes.background: Currently, we are required to buy a TV licence if we own a television, even if we only watch other TV channels. I would like Parliament to remove this requirement, so that the BBC is funded only by users of it's services.
